mapper.select: select C.challenge_code, fk_category_code, G.category_name as category_name, challenge_name, content, regDate , challenge_exp, member_count, thumbnail, fk_freq_type, F.frequency, fk_during_type, D.set_date , to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate, fk_userid , to_char(hour_start, 'hh24:mi') as hour_start, to_char(hour_end, 'hh24:mi') as hour_end , success_img, fail_img, example , to_char( startdate + (to_number(fk_during_type) * 7), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as enddate from tbl_challenge C join tbl_category G on G.category_code = C.fk_category_code join tbl_challenge_during D on D.during_type = C.fk_during_type join tbl_certify_freq F on F.freq_type = C.fk_freq_type join tbl_certify_hour H on H.challenge_code = C.challenge_code join tbl_certify_exam E on E.challenge_code = C.challenge_code order by C.challenge_code desc
